note: Chasing high technical knowledge. Making time for deep work often. Use open source. Support communities. Be open but value privacy. Be around inspiring people. Learn new skills every day. Get hired for attitude. Becoming a better person. A balanced mix of Technical Customer Success Manager, Sales Engineer, Systems & Business Analyst. Infrastructure Engineer, DevSecOps. Goal-oriented behaviours and networks of a Head of Technical Sales, Customer Success Lead CIO. Living in Prague, Czechia.
